name: tiling2bsml
description: convert show_tiling output into BSML sequence mapping documents

options.description: [REQUIRED] file containing tiling path data from show_tiling • --bsml_repository,-b [REQUIRED] filepath to the bsml repository
[OPTIONAL] a non-zero value will result in compressed bsml output • --output,-o [REQUIRED] output BSML file containing coverage information • --help,-h This help message
